model.employee

Class Employee

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.employee.Employee
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cook, Hostess, Manager, Server

    public abstract class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for types of employees. Contains employeeID, and the name of the employees first and last name class name employee description: this class would allow employees to input their id name how many hours they are assigned to what days they are working and if they are suppose to be working that day.
    Author:
    Christina Sadhu
